transcript:
carpeted stairs. 
"My dear," she said to her son, once more stimulating him by a touch, "you promised me!" 
The son, lowering his eyes, followed her quietly. 
They entered the large hall, from which one of the doors led to the apartments assigned to Prince Vasili. 
Just as the mother and son, having reached the middle of the hall, were about to ask their way of an elderly footman who had sprung up as they entered, the bronze handle of one of the doors turned and Prince Vasili came out- weari
